training_program.name: Football Strength and Conditioning
training_program.description: This program focuses on strength and conditioning for football players.

training_sets.name: Sprint Intervals
training_sets.description: Perform sprint intervals to improve speed and endurance.

training_sets.name: Weighted Lunges
training_sets.description: Execute weighted lunges to strengthen leg muscles.

training_sets.name: Agility Drills
training_sets.description: Improve agility with ladder drills and cone drills.

training_set.name: Warm-up Routine
training_set.description: Start with a comprehensive warm-up routine to prepare the body for training.
